alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 2:41PM MST until January 07 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 to 6 inches in valleys and 6 to 10 mountains. * WHERE...Dobson Pass, Eastport, Metaline Falls, Metaline, Northport, Sherman Pass, St. Maries, Inchelium, Bonners Ferry, Boulder Creek Road, Priest River, Republic, Fourth Of July Pass, Pinehurst, Chewelah, Orin-Rice Road, Ione, Springdale-Hunters Road, Chesaw Road, Kettle Falls, Mullan, Sandpoint, Newport, Fernwood, Athol, Fruitland, Wauconda, Flowery Trail Road, Deer Park, Tiger, Lookout Pass, Osburn, Wallace, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Colville, Clark Fork, Kellogg, and Schweitzer Mountain Road. * WHEN...From 10 PM Friday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
